title: How to Make Chipotle Hummus

steps.headline: Combine the chopped chipotle pepper through the hummus.
steps.description: Make sure that it is completely combined.

steps.headline: Add the coriander or basil and mix well.
steps.description: Again, ensure that the additions are evenly distributed.

steps.headline: Refrigerate until ready to serve.
steps.description: Transfer to a suitable serving dish if required. Garnish with fresh herbs  or a sprinkling of paprika if desired. This is delicious!

text: Combine the chopped chipotle pepper through the hummus. Make sure that it is completely combined. Add the coriander or basil and mix well. Again, ensure that the additions are evenly distributed. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Transfer to a suitable serving dish if required. Garnish with fresh herbs  or a sprinkling of paprika if desired. This is delicious! Finished.
